protocol.name: P-GSE33412-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown on MS medium with or without 100nM 24-eBL in the darkness for 4 days

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-3
protocol.text: Sterilized seeds were germinated on medium containing 2% sucrose (w/v) and 0.8% agar (w/v). After cold (4℃) treatment for 3 days, seeds were germinated at 22℃ in light (16h light/8h dark cycles) for 8h then transferred to grown in the darkness for 4 days

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen, Germany). RNA quality and quantity were tested by Agilent Bioanalyzer 2100 (Agilent technologies, US) and further purified by RNeasy micro kit (QIAGEN, Germany) and RNase-Free DNase Set (QIAGEN, Germany)

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-5
protocol.text: RNA were labled using biotin as described in the affymetrix technical manual (Affymetri, USA)

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-6
protocol.text: Array hybridization and wash was performed using GeneChip® Hybridization,Wash and Stain Kit (Affymetrix, US) followed the manufacturer’s instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-7
protocol.text: Slides were scanned by GeneChip® Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix, US) and Command Console Software 3.1 (Affymetrix, US) with default settings

protocol.name: P-GSE33412-8
protocol.text: Raw data were normalized by MAS 5.0 algorithm, Gene Spring Software 11.0 (Agilent technologies, US);The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100
